response.overview: Highlights from the 1996-97 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry. 1.2 million and counting. ROCK' EM SOCK' EM 9 is the newest edition to the best selling sports video series in the world. Blue and I have sat down and watched over 200 hours of highlights to bring you the best action you've seen. You're gonna love all the hits, saves, goals, great plays and, or course, the odd tussle. Naturally, we have Coach's Corner highlights and the best bloopers. AS A BONUS, I'm going to answer all the questions you hockey parents have asked me over the years. Blue says, 'ROCK' EM SOCK' EM 9 is the best hockey video yet!' I say you're going to love it.
response.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 9
